Package.Name: RainHourForecast
Package.Author: Hydro
Package.Description: Package to get rain forecast for the next hour from meteo france

Setting.name: TownsId
Setting.description: Towns' id comma separated (use the 'FindId' MessageCallback to get the towns' id from the postal code)

Setting.name: RefreshInterval
Setting.description: Refresh rate of the forecast in minutes

Setting.name: IdUrl
Setting.description: Url from meteo france to get town's id

Setting.name: ForecastUrl
Setting.description: Url from meteo france to get rain forecast
